Elementalite falls 126 times, survives

Sansa Ondatél • January 8, 2025

A local Elementalite, Jamie Dragin, has set the current ŋorld record for "most times fallen from heights in a single month", with 126 falls. The builder of the Elemental Theater, Dragin was rather non-chalant about this accomplishment. When interviewed, he simply said that "I had to get to my bed." Why falling from heights causes one to appear at the last bed they slept in has yet to be determined.
